nodes.bodyText:
Because this CI used to check the go file style, we can make it running when the go file changes. You can add paths to restrict the CI running. like:
paths:
  - '.github/workflows/**'
  - 'pulsar-client-go/**'
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,51 @@

+
+name: CI - Go Functions style check
+on:
+  pull_request:
+    branches:
+      - master
+    paths-ignore:
